html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08212024-06-21ISED, SSHRC
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectHumanities Research Council of Canada - Public Service Alliance of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Public Service Alliance that covers all employees in the Administrative and Foreign Services bargaining unit,for the period beginning on April 1, 2021 and ending on March 31, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by the Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Public Service Alliance  that covers all employees in the Administrative and Foreign Services bargaining unit,for the period beginning on April 1, 2021 and ending on March 31, 2025.
